statements: SELECT * FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records;
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE date_performed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records ORDER BY date_performed DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY date_performed DESC, cost ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_cost > 1000
SELECT maintenance_type, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost_per_maintenance FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type
SELECT MAX(cost) AS highest_cost_maintenance FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records WHERE date_performed >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM public_transportation_maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT mechanic_name, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%oil%' ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer, model DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, mechanic_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE mechanic_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle_details WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC, year ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, model DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact WHERE emissions_rating > 4 AND eco_friendly = TRUE;

SELECT vehicle_id, license_plate, emissions_rating FROM vehicles JOIN environmental_impact ON vehicles.vehicle_id = environmental_impact.vehicle_id WHERE energy_consumption < 10.5 ORDER BY emissions_rating DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year FROM Vehicles
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT year, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change'
SELECT type_name FROM MaintenanceTypes
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV'
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM Manufacturers
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id = 5
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT carbon_footprint, emission_level FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, notes FROM Inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND maintenance_type like '%engine%' ORDER BY maintenance_cost ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, carbon_footprint FROM EnvironmentalImpact WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY vehicle_id, carbon_footprint;
SELECT manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspection_result, notes FROM Inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
